text.p: Halla TBN - three or four cargoes of 33,000/40,000 tonnes sulphur Vancouver/Santos $14.50 fio 10,000 shinc/5,000 shex 1/3-31/8 Canpotex.
Anax - 30,000 tonnes potash Vancouver/Antwerp $18.50 fio 5,000 shinc/5,000 shex ppt Canpotex.
TBN - 30,000 tonnes potash Ilichevsk/China $29 fio 2,400 shex/4,000 shinc 1-15/3 Sinochem.
Darya Camal - 29,000 tonnes phosphate Casablanca or Jorf Lasfar/Cochin $24.50 scale load/3,000 12-17/3 Indian Government.
Proteus - 20,000 tonnes urea Constanza/India $31.50 3,500/1,200 shex 10-15/3 Indian Government.
Obo Engin - 55,000 tonnes fertiliser Black Sea/China $19.50 fio 5,000/3,500 mid Mar Chemimport.
